title: A peaceful and quaint religious place
review: We visited this temple on our return journey to New Delhi.

title: Popular among locals
review: It is on the way to lansdowne in kotdwar. It is popular among locals as we saw everyone taking a halt. View of river is awsome from the temple.

title: Jai Durga Devi
review: The temple is for person who likes nature's beauty as well as peace. Durga Devi temple is between Kotdwar & Lansdowne route. Must visit temple if you are in Kotdwar.

title: Very good
review: very well maintained newly built temple and maintained by the Army itself. Nice bhajans being played all along the road.

title: Durga devi temple
review: This temp,e is located on the khoh river and 9 kilometers from kotdwar goddess durga fulfill the wishes of visitors.

title: The location of this temple is just awesome!
review: This temple can be visited either while going to Lansdowne from Kotdwar or while coming back. Nevertheless, it is a must visit place. Near to this temple is a cave with Shivling. It is situated on a hill top, below which flows thru a stream of water. Very much appealing!

title: gr8 stopeover
review: you can visit the temple and then spend hours near the flowing waters which is mighty cold. the water is crystal clear

title: A temple at river side
review: Durga devi temple is situated between Kotdwar and Lansdowne. It is a small temple on the bank of a river. Scenery behind the temple, of water coming down from the rocks is awesome. You must surely pay a visit to durga devi temple while going or coming from lansdowne.

title: Very revered Daity
review: Locals have great faith and reverence for this temple . Small but beautiful and in peaceful environment and on the banks of a river . Go with devotion and come back blessed .

title: A Temple on an awesome River Bank
review: This is a Temple located at the bank of Khoh river when you go to Lansedowne. The location is awesome and should be visited when going to Lansedowne. You can find lots of fishes in the River but its forbidden to Fish there

title: A good halt on the way to Lansdowne
review: A bit outside the town, this was a nice break for us and the kids. The mango-laden trees behind the temple and the raging river (during the monsoons) were very relaxing and gave our legs a much needed break from driving.

title: Temple and riverbank ( We been hearing it a lot it mean civilization )
review: This place comes when you travel from Kothdwar to Lansdown. It recommend to visit to sought blessing and it give you wonderful view of river bank mountain beside.

title: beautiful temple with great view
review: ohk place to go and view bful river flowing, durga ji and shiv temple in a cave . can go and relax and have a great tym

title: Spritual
review: This is a old temple and worth visiting only for faith. No tourist attraction, go there if worship the devi

title: Spiritual and good view from temple
review: This is on the main road on the left side while going to Lansdowne from Kotdwar. It's not famous among tourists as it's a very small temple just on the bank of Khoh river. A part of temple is inside a small cave and it's not easy to get into that cave. You can try to visit river downstairs if the priest allows else it's barricaded and closed. At this time there was hardly any water in the river. The local priest sells mango pickle which probably he makes himself. There are 1-2 few mango trees around. Do pay a visit.

title: A GREAT TREK WITH A GREAT VIEW
review: offers a good view and a good trek.. If you are looking for a place where you can actually climb down to the river, a good place for such thrill seekers. Got an amazing evening here. At night when you are here, you can actually see the moon shining through this river which is beautiful.

title: Nice, quaint, peaceful place, visited in June 2016
review: This temple is on the way to Lansdowne, near Kotdwar, overlooking the river Khoh.

title: Place for Meditation
review: This is a place to do some meditation. a very quite place. also famous for watching the perfect and very clear sunset from here.

title: Durga Devi Temple
review: Durga Devi Temple is situated 25 km before Lansdowne.A small seasonal stream is flowing from below the temple

title: Worship of Durga
review: Durga Devi Temple is located at a distance of around 25 km from Lansdowne, on the bank of River Khoh. This temple is located inside a cave and is dedicated to Goddesses Durga and is considered to be one of the oldest Sidh Peeths.

title: Jwalpa mata mandir.
review: Place is holy and devine. Visitors have to walk down for the temple. It is situated on the bank of holy river and have very old historic value.

title: Visit the Goddess
review: Temples are all sacred . We liked the visit and one can have great views of the sunset in the evening.

title: Ours favourite stop before or after Lansdowne.
review: We (friends) have been to Lansdowne 3 to 4 times just because we love the peaceful environment of Lansdowne. If you plan your itinerary when the rainy season start then believe me you will witness the beauty of mother nature at its very best & untouched.

title: Clean and Peace atmoshphere
review: ON the circle road have to be entered from Jaswant Dwar. Peaceful and scinic place.Godess Dugra Temple.

title: Combination of Nature and God
review: Its a wonderfull place for nature lover, The rocks are awesome and beautiful in surroundings. But never go to inside the river it can be dangerouse for tourist.

title: Interesting place
review: Mata rani is sitting (Virajman) inside the cave. views are too god from this temple. I love the place and had visited 3 times here.
